1370: Bertoldus moved to Op Havick2.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Scilla at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Scilla, Bertoldus, at age 21.
1372: Had a daughter with Scilla, Gisele, at age 23.
1374: Had a daughter with Scilla, Imma, at age 25.
1375: Had a son with Scilla, Gilis, at age 26.
1376: Had a son with Scilla, Everocker, at age 27.
Lost daughter Gisele when Gisele was 5 years old.
1380: Lost his wife Scilla while she was giving birth to Lelien in 1380.
Became caretaker of Bertoldus, Imma, Gilis, Everocker, Lelien at age 32.
1382: Lost son Everocker when Everocker was 7 years old.
1387: Lost son Gilis when Gilis was 13 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
